Reviews.Title: very good phone
Reviews.Author: saidoem
Reviews.Content: very nice . this phone is much better than Sanmung Galaxy S2..... faster than htc one s ...more in ues....

Reviews.Title: pretty nice phone
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: Have been using this phone for a few days. Body is pretty slim. The AMOLED display is amazing as well. I Like it!!

Reviews.Title: i like it ,,......
Reviews.Author: wle "wle"
Reviews.Content: i like itothers have said what they likei like itbut anything this complex has some odd things about itcamera has no dedicated shutter buttoni can;t seem to get android voice input to work [without google voice recognition]==edit now it is workingrear camera lens is a bump on the backnot sure that won;t get scratchedit isn;t recessed, it does have a window that looks like glass but  stillrecessed would be betterthe glass window is on top and makes it stick out even fartherit can also get dirty and take blurry picturesbattery not user replaceable [but i knew that]no real keyboard [also i knew that and it can;t have one and be so thin]not sure the camera is very goodso far just blurry pictures is all i get in ordinary room light==edit now i have some good ones, probably just messed settings upring tones are not very loud even on maxvibrate is not very strongnot sure there is a reminder for voice mail and missed calls other than one timenot sure there is a 'download voice mail to the phone so i don;t have to call to get it' appwle

Reviews.Title: Ugly phone
Reviews.Author: Mubai Li
Reviews.Content: 1. This is a ugly phone under the light of iPhone 5 and Samsung Galaxy. 2. put the brand at the top of the phone is such a spit on the face.
